metadata.description:
Now that he's returned to Charm City, Fist of Justice would like nothing more than to ease back into defending his city from crime. Maybe your run of the mill mugging or carjacking -- you know, the simple stuff. Too bad it's not going to be that easy.

Monsters made of molten rock, zombies and adventures into alternate timelines are just some of the things Marc Mason has to deal with before he can even think of taking it easy.
metadata.name: Fist of Justice, Vol. 2
